error.unable_read_log: Unable to read the log file. Please make sure that you have launched the game before.
error.unable_get_gacha_history_url: Unable to fetch the URL of the wish history page, please make sure that you have opened it in the game.
error.unable_get_player_uid: Unable to get the player UID.
error.get_gacha_type_data_api_url_failed: Failed to get the API endpoint of the wish type data.
error.get_gacha_history_api_url_failed: Unable to get the API endpoint of the wish history data.
error.get_items_api_url_failed: Unable to get the API endpoint of the item data.
error.get_area_parameter_failed: Unable to get the region parameters. Please reopen the wish history page in the game.
error.mihoyo_api_invalid: Invalid miHoYo API authorization, please reopen the wish history page in the game.
error.mihoyo_api_expired: Expired miHoYo API Authorization, please reopen the wish history page in the game.
error.get_gacha_type_list_failed: Failed to fetch the API data of the wish type list.
error.get_gacha_history_failed: Unable to fetch the API data of the wish history.
